abstract: A value that determines the behavior of the title’s visibility.
overview:
## Discussion

Use one of the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/FeatureVisibility] values to control how the framework displays the title’s visibility. The default is [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/FeatureVisibility/Adaptive].

You can’t set the title visibility property of the map feature annotation.

# titleVisibility

**Instance Property**

A value that determines the behavior of the title’s visibility.

## Declaration

```swift
get titleVisibility(): FeatureVisibility;
```

## Discussion

Use one of the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/FeatureVisibility] values to control how the framework displays the title’s visibility. The default is [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/FeatureVisibility/Adaptive].

You can’t set the title visibility property of the map feature annotation.
title: titleVisibility
